<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goblin-Eye Orb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1229)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 184</row>

**Price** 24 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Strike with the affixed firearm or crossbow against an enemy that's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to you

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed firearm or crossbow and an expert in Perception.
</row>

</column>

---

This colorful marble dangles from a leather thong wrapped around the affixed weapon. When you activate the band, for  the triggering Strike, you don't need to attempt a flat check due to the enemy being concealed or hidden to you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Goblin-Eye Orb
requirement: You're an expert with the affixed firearm or crossbow and an expert in Perception.
